Summary Experience in providing strategic advice and direction for managing change arising from the project in the organization, identifies potential risks, creates plans to mitigate the risk and executes the plan. Identifies whether new teams/structure need to be set up because of implementing the new process and as well as how to communicate these changes and what training measures are necessary for the success of the project and the company. Ensuring that human and organizational risks to the implementation are identified and that actions are put in place to mini-mize them. Ensures that human and organizational benefits are maxi-mized to achieve the greatest return on the investment made. 
 
My consulting experience focuses mainly on training programs management, organization design alignment stakeholder management, communication management and assessing organization's readiness for change, Facilitates the execution of the change management plan, ensuring coordination alignment across all aspects of the project and related projects. Leverages multiple channels for delivering change management activities (training, communications, etc.). Responsible for the development of training plans, creation of training materials, and con-ducting training. Reviews the training, communications, performance support and organization design deliverable throughout development to ensure quality and traceability to requirements Works with HR organization to transition people to new organization structure 
In addition, 5 years of experience with 8 full SAP change management cycles for both International and local governmental clients in MEA region plus 2 SAP full cycles as Testing Manger.
